text: Tuvya Ruebner, also Rübner (; 30 January 1924 – 29 July 2019) was an Israeli poet, editor, translator and photographer.Israel Prize for Literature awarded to Ida Fink, Tuvya Ruebner and Nili Mirsky Haaretz, 26 February 2008 He was born in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He became a member of kibbutz Merhavia. For many years he was a schoolteacher and later lectured on literature at Haifa University. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Academics of Haifa University Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:People from Bratislava Category:Photographers Category:Israeli poets Category:Refugees from Nazism Category:Slovakian Jews Category:Israeli teachers Category:Israeli translators
